Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $9,500. This represents a substantial saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am eager to see this product contribute to your success and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
